definition.text: You got this. Creating references is a piece of cake. Let's make the connection!

paragraphs.text: Out of the three Data Mine Products nodes available, we are going to link our chart to the Candles Data Mine.
Find the Layer Manager under the Timeline Chart you added earlier. Then establish a reference from it to the Candles Data Mine Products node.
If things are connected correctly, the name of the data mine should appear over the layer manager.
